titles: Disce vivere Learne to live : a briefe treatise of learning to liue, vvherein is shewed, that the life of Christ is the most perfect patterne of direction to the life of a Christian : in which also, the well disposed may behold their orderlie passage, from the state of grace, to the state of glorie.
author: Sutton, Christopher, 1565?-1629.
publisher: Printed by E. Short, for Cuthbert Burby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Swanne,
